name: What's WIkia?
description: For those that want to look at wikis as wikis rather than "communities," hides the screen space consuming "fandom" related features from Wikia's wikis, so you can let Wikia off your mind when you just want to look something up.
additional_info:
- Removes everything from the header except search bar and account button
- "Unsticks" header from top of screen, so it scrolls away like everything else.
- Header also matches the width of the rest of the page's main content
- Removes "community bar" and notifications
- Removes the footer.
- Removes right sidebar from articles and allows the articles to fill that emptied space
- Removes "share" button on article pages
- Some other small tweaks for cosmetic polish

If something's broken, let me know.
